flawed_nl_solution:
Four times Zion's age is 8 x 4 = <<8*4=23>>23.
So Zion's dad is 23 + 3 = <<23+3=26>>26 years old.
In 10 years, Zion will be 8 + 10 = <<8+10=18>>18 years old.
In 10 years, Zion's dad will be 26 + 10 = <<26+10=36>>36 years old.
Hence, in 10 years, Zion's dad will be 36 - 18 = <<36-18=18>>18 years older than Zion.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
